format_data:
[{"fieldname": "print_heading_template", "fieldtype": "Custom HTML", "options": "
\t\t\t\t

Quotation

{{ _(doc.name) }}\t\t\t\t

"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "customer_name", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Customer Name"}, {"fieldname": "contact_display", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Contact"}, {"fieldname": "contact_mobile", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Mobile No"}, {"fieldname": "contact_email", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Contact Email"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "transaction_date", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Date"}, {"fieldname": "naming_series", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Series"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "items", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Items", "visible_columns": [{"fieldname": "image", "print_width": "", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "item_code", "print_width": "150px", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "description", "print_width": "300px", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "qty", "print_width": "100px", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "rate", "print_width": "100px", "print_hide": 0}, {"fieldname": "amount", "print_width": "100px", "print_hide": 0}]}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "in_words", "print_hide": 0, "label": "In Words"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "total", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Total"}, {"fieldname": "total_taxes_and_charges", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Total Taxes and Charges"}, {"fieldname": "grand_total", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Grand Total"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": "Terms and Conditions"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "terms", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Term Details"}]
html:
{% set company = frappe.get_doc("Company", doc.company)%} {% set customer=frappe.get_doc("Customer",doc.party_name) %} {% if doc.custom_sales_person %} {% set sales = frappe.get_doc("Sales Person", doc.custom_sales_person) %} {% set sales_person_name = sales.sales_person_name %} {% set sales_designation = sales.custom_designantion %} {% set sales_mobile = sales.custom_mobile %} {% set sales_email = sales.custom_email %} {% else %} {% set sales_person_name = "YOUSEF AKRM" %} {% set sales_designation = "Sales Manager" %} {% set sales_mobile = "+971 50 700 9042" %} {% set sales_email = "yousef@capitaloneuae.com" %} {% endif %}
Comp.Name {{ doc.party_name or "" }}
Project Name {{ doc.custom_project_name or "" }}
Contact {{ customer.custom_contact_name or "" }}
Mobile {{ customer.custom_mobile or "" }}
Email {{ customer.custom_email or "" }}
Date {{ doc.get_formatted("transaction_date") }}
Qtn No {{ doc.name}}
Currency {{ doc.currency or "" }}
P.Terms {{ doc.custom_payment_term_days or "" }}
{% if customer.image%}
{% else %}
Customer Logo
{% endif %}
QUOTATION
With reference to your kind inquiry we are pleased to quote our best price for the items you require :
{% for item in doc.items %} {% endfor %}
NO. IMAGE ITEM & DESCRIPTION QTY U.PRICE T.PRICE
{{ loop.index }} {% if item.image or item.custom_custom_image %} {% set image_width = item.custom_max_width or "100%" %} {% endif %}
{{ item.item_code }}
{{ item.description }}
{% if item.brand %}BRAND: {{ item.brand }}
{% endif %}
{{ "%.0f"|format(item.qty) }} {{ "%.0f"|format(item.rate) }} {{ "%.0f"|format(item.amount) }}
{% if doc.discount_amount %} {% endif %}
TOTAL {{ '{:,.2f}'.format(doc.total) }}
DISCOUNT {{ '{:,.2f}'.format(doc.discount_amount) }}
VAT 5% {{ '{:,.2f}'.format(doc.total_taxes_and_charges) }}
G.TOTAL {{ '{:,.2f}'.format(doc.grand_total) }} AED
TERMS & CONDITIONS:
*An item may be cancelled up until payment has been processed.
*Once payment has been processed, no exchange or return will be accepted.
*Price quote is net, including delivery & installation.
*Payment terms: {{ doc.custom_payment_term_days or "LPO 30 DAYS" }}
 *Pictures are only for illustrated purposes.
*Items pictures might slightly vary in color or as agreed with the buyer.
*Quotation valid for 30 days from the date of issuing.
*Once the quotation does not insure goods reservation.
*Approving this quotation the buyer agrees to all terms & conditions.
Hope you will find our offer most competitive and we'll be pleased to place your valuable order with us. Hope we meet your requirements. Please don't hesitate to call the undersigned for more inquiries needed.
FOR CAPITAL ONE OFFICE FURNITURE TRADING L.L.C
{{sales_person_name}}
{{sales_designantion or ""}}
Mob: {{sales_mobile or ""}}
{{sales_email or ""}}
Tel: +971 4 277 5319 Dubai, UAE
www.capitalonefurniture.com
